PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MemberTypePost
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of a post. A post is a linear (usually vertical) member used to support something or to mark a point.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: ConicityRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of the diameter of the cone bottom surface to the height of the pole.

PropertyDef.Name: LoadBearingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum load bearing capacity of the floor structure throughtout the storey as designed.

PropertyDef.Name: WindLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Wind load resistance rating for this object. It is provided according to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: BendingStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: Defining values: Î±; defined values: bending strength.
